Text.Page: Shandra Manaya took Sikander's flame and retreated to her lair. You killed her there, ending the Argon War, but she uttered the name "Manahan" before dying.
Kaia came to {@Rgn:76001$$Kanstria} for news of Shandra Manaya. Meet her and ask about Sikander's flame.

! What happened?

You saw Shandra Manaya?"Yes, and she's got Sikander's flame."

That must be why the argons took Kelsaik's corpse. I had no idea part of Sikander remained within Kelsaik—and I have no idea what she's planning to do with it.

Manahan, you created something so heartless. No wonder Arun and Shara locked you up."Wait...who's Manahan?"

Manahan is an ancient name, ...a name best forgotten.

Focus on the task at hand. Sikander's flame is the embodiment of creation itself. Think of the Core...then multiply it by a thousand.

In Shandra Manaya's hands, Sikander's flame could destroy as well as create. Track Shandra Manaya down and retrieve Sikander's flame at all costs!

I felt Shandra Manaya's death—a wave of pain that rippled across the world. The Argon War is over, and we won!

The whole world owes you its very existence. You did what no one else, god or mortal, could do. Hail , destroyer of argons, vanquisher of gods, champion of the Valkyon Federation!

In the coming months, we'll try to figure out why Shandra Manaya wanted Sikander's flame. I have my suspicions, but the important thing is that Shandra Manaya's plan died when she did.
